TopicTitle: To The Mun, PT 1 Maneuver Not working (Bug)

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

When I do the tutorial, To the Mun Part 1, I get to the second screen and it asks to place a maneuver on the orbit. This does not work. The orbit just turns gray, and I cant continue the tutorial. This was also verified by another user on a Steam account. Version 1.2.2.1622 (WindowsPlayer)

I assume you already played previous tutorials, in particular "Basic Flight" (there's a opening note in "To the Mun" though may not be clear). If not, give that a try and tell if you still have orbital maneuvers locked afterwards.
I had the same issue.  Apparently it is a known bug.  If you load a Sandbox game and then exit and re-load the Tutorial you will then be able to place the maneuver and complete it.
